titles.title: A bill to protect children and other consumers against hazards associated with the accidental ingestion of button cell batteries by requiring the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate consumer product safety standards to require child-resistant closures on remote controls and other consumer products that use such batteries, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3688-3689)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
